symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.severity: Variable, can be high and spiking, or persistent
symptoms.pattern: Undulant (rising and falling in waves), can persist for days or weeks

vital_signs.temperature: Elevated, often spiking in the afternoon

physical_findings: Inflammation of bones, joints, or inner organs
risk_factors: Contact with infected animals (cattle, goats, camels, dogs, pigs)
Consumption of unpasteurized animal products (dairy products, meat)
Occupation involving contact with animals or meat (slaughterhouse workers, farmers, veterinarians)

required: Laboratory examinations (blood cultures, serological testing, molecular methods)
